name: Youth Organisation ALEXIS Prilep
goal: Our mission is social inclusion and gender equality in the field of the European Union by representing the interests of young people with fewer opportunities, including in the decision-making process through lifelong learning. Our work involves recognising the competencies, methods and the social and psychological development of young people, youth workers, and educators on an initiative that provides an opportunity to generate mutual support, foster the fundamental rights and active citizenship.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
• Young people and decision-makers in a dialogue;
• Active citizenship, democracy, solidarity and fundamental rights;
• Civic and democratic participation of young people at EU level;
• Equal opportunities, life perspectives and a sense of social purpose, freedom of expression and building peaceful communities.
